Projects.Title: Silva Sanctus
Projects.Description: Silva Sanctus is a project made with Unity, as a swiss maturity project. It is a roguelite game made in 8 months.

Projects.Title: MiniFlog
Projects.Description: MiniFlog is a puzzle game made with Unity for the GMTK game jam. It was made in under 48 hours.

Projects.Title: Gambler's Fallacy
Projects.Description: Gambler's Fallacy is a minecraft mod that adds slot machines and a weapon based on random chance.

Projects.Title: Tealeaf
Projects.Description: Tealeaf is a minecraft mod that adds tea.

Projects.Title: Jeopardy
Projects.Description: A quick template to make interactive jeopardy-like games.
